âˆ‡C(Î©)=[âˆ‚Ci1âˆ‚Ï‰i11âˆ‚Ci1âˆ‚Ï‰i12â‹¯âˆ‚Ci1âˆ‚Ï‰i1nâˆ‚Ci2âˆ‚Ï‰i21âˆ‚Ci2âˆ‚Ï‰i22â‹¯âˆ‚Ci2âˆ‚Ï‰i2nâ‹®â‹±â‹®âˆ‚Cimâˆ‚Ï‰im1âˆ‚Cimâˆ‚Ï‰im2â‹¯âˆ‚Cimâˆ‚Ï‰imn]=[Di1Di2â‹®Dim][aiâˆ’11aiâˆ’12â‹¯aiâˆ’1n]\nabla C(\Omega) = \begin{bmatrix}\frac{\partial C_i^1}{\partial \omega_{i}^{11}} &\frac{\partial C_i^1}{\partial \omega_{i}^{12}} &\cdots &\frac{\partial C_i^1}{\partial \omega_{i}^{1n}} \\\frac{\partial C_i^2}{\partial \omega_{i}^{21}} &\frac{\partial C_i^2}{\partial \omega_{i}^{22}} &\cdots &\frac{\partial C_i^2}{\partial \omega_{i}^{2n}} \\\vdots & & \ddots & \vdots \\\frac{\partial C_i^m}{\partial \omega_{i}^{m1}} &\frac{\partial C_i^m}{\partial \omega_{i}^{m2}} &\cdots &\frac{\partial C_i^m}{\partial \omega_{i}^{mn}}\end{bmatrix} = \begin{bmatrix}D_i^1 \\D_i^2 \\\vdots \\D_i^m\end{bmatrix}\begin{bmatrix}a_{i-1}^1 & a_{i-1}^2 & \cdots && a_{i-1}^n\end{bmatrix}âˆ‡C(Î©)=â£â¡â€‹âˆ‚Ï‰i11â€‹âˆ‚Ci1â€‹â€‹âˆ‚Ï‰i21â€‹âˆ‚Ci2â€‹â€‹â‹®âˆ‚Ï‰im1â€‹âˆ‚Cimâ€‹â€‹â€‹âˆ‚Ï‰i12â€‹âˆ‚Ci1â€‹â€‹âˆ‚Ï‰i22â€‹âˆ‚Ci2â€‹â€‹âˆ‚Ï‰im2â€‹âˆ‚Cimâ€‹â€‹â€‹â‹¯â‹¯â‹±â‹¯â€‹âˆ‚Ï‰i1nâ€‹âˆ‚Ci1â€‹â€‹âˆ‚Ï‰i2nâ€‹âˆ‚Ci2â€‹â€‹â‹®âˆ‚Ï‰imnâ€‹âˆ‚Cimâ€‹â€‹â€‹â¦â¤â€‹=â£â¡â€‹Di1â€‹Di2â€‹â‹®Dimâ€‹â€‹â¦â¤â€‹[aiâˆ’11â€‹â€‹aiâˆ’12â€‹â€‹â‹¯â€‹â€‹aiâˆ’1nâ€‹â€‹]
